divs: sighting detailsi was about nine or ten yrs old, i remember it was in the early 70's probally 1971 0r 1972. my dad sent my brother to the store and i went with him. it was in memphis, tennessee, i dont recall what month it was, but i believe it was around summer time because had on a t shirt. on the way back from the store, my brother screamed out, " look a ufo," while pointing out the window, towards me. i just busted out laughing until i turned my head. then i began to get scared and was saying go , go home. he said no, he wanted to watch it. so as i sat there trembling and watching this ufo with amazement because of all the movement in the sky, it was zipping by doing all kinds of manuvers in every direction. i think we watched it for a few hours, i do know that when we returned home, that when we came in my dad said "where have you been?" i guess he thought we were out joy riding in the car. we wasnt. well when my brother told him what we saw, i was told to go to bed and thats all i remember..execpt what the ufo looked like. i made a pic the best i could to describe what we seen. i guess you would say it was round with spikes pertruding out all over and at the end of the spikes were colored lights, it really was a beautiful thing to see, and i never seen a pic that anyone reported that looked like the one that we saw that night until today which is why i am writing. i caught about five min. of a show with a man named chris bledsoe, i think in carolina. i think he seen three of them and then they combined to make this spikeball like the one i seen. it is the closest thing to this day to match what my brother and i saw that night. i will submit a pic of what i saw. i made this pic on 10\10\2010.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
